00050     void AudioInfo::setAudioParams(string fileName, long int fileSize,
00051         double totalTime, int channels, int sampleRate, double bitRate,
00052         int bitsPerSample) {
00053       this -> fileName = fileName;
00054       this -> fileSize = fileSize;
00055       this -> totalTime = totalTime;
00056       this -> channels = channels;
00057       this -> sampleRate = sampleRate;
00058       this -> bitRate = bitRate;
00059       this -> bitsPerSample = bitsPerSample;
00060     }
